text: Lee Han-dong (December 5, 1934 - May 8, 2021)Profile of Lee Han-dong was a South Korean politician. He was from May 2000 to July 2002 the 33th Prime Minister of South Korea. Lee died on May 8, 2021 in Pocheon, South Korea at the age of 86.Former PM Lee Han-dong dies at 87 ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of South Korea
title: Lee Han-dong
